Inspiring Success.name: Inspiring Success
Inspiring Success.flavor: When you successfully lay waste to an enemy, your allies are bolstered by the inspiring example you set.
Inspiring Success.trigger: You hit an enemy with a basic attack using a weapon.
Inspiring Success.effect: The enemy takes 2d10 extra damage from the attack. In addition, you and each ally in your skald’s aura gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier and can make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end.

Assured Skill.name: Assured Skill
Assured Skill.flavor: You provide words of advice that can help turn the most difficult task into something that is within your ally’s grasp.
Assured Skill.trigger: You or one ally within 5 squares of you makes a skill check.
Assured Skill.target: The triggering character in the burst
Assured Skill.effect: The target can choose either to gain a +5 bonus to that skill check or to reroll the skill check and use either result.

Death March.name: Death March
Death March.flavor: You sing or speak words that exhort your allies not to fail, for death is all that remains for them if they do.
Death March.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your skald’s aura gains the following effect: Once per round, you or an ally in your skald’s aura can roll twice for an attack roll and use either result.
